edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.repository

Interface WapObjectRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TransactionRepository
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnnotationRepository, ContainerRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollectedRepository, JenaRepository

    public interface WapObjectRepository
extends TransactionRepository
    Provides the functions for all the necessary operations in the database that could not have been handled in RDF. The red:seq operations for example are not implemented in apache.commons.rdf so we are using the functions of the rdf-backend here.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.repository.TransactionRepository

        TransactionRepository.Type
